buttons.confirm_proceed: Are you sure you want to proceed?

player_initialization.error_no_players_inserted: Insert at least one player to start the match

configurations.error_in_configuration: There was a mistake in your configuration: Check every requirement is respected:
configurations.error_tracks: tracks must be a sequence of words/numbers wrapped in [ ] and each of them must  be wrapped in quotation marks
configurations.error_shots_per_track: error_shots_per_track must be a number greater then zero
configurations.error_tentatives: number of elements in list of points must be equal to shots_per_tentative * tentatives (ex. 9 = 3*3)
